properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 24 at 3:16PM EST until January 25 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level
expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline.

* WHERE...Southern Queens County.

* WHEN...Between 6 AM and 11 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is expected in the more vulnerable
locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low
lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and
homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will
experience shallow flooding.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY
